actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act with respect to aliens who seek to enter the United States to do research at colleges and universities.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include certain aliens seeking to enter the United States to do university-level research within the definition of "aliens who are members of the teaching profession or who have exceptional ability in the sciences or the arts."

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act with respect to aliens who seek to enter the United States to do research at colleges and universities.
